about_the_game:
Elevate your rally experience with the EA SPORTS™ WRC 24 Locations & Cars Content Pack. Discover thrilling new locations, Tet Rally Latvia and the Orlen 80th Rally Poland. Drive the latest high-performance vehicles like the Ford Fiesta Rally3 Evo and Toyota GR Yaris Rally1 HYBRID '24. Customize your rally cars with more than 50 new liveries and compete against 52 official crews. Brace yourself to embark on your continued rally journey.

2 new locations:
  • Tet Rally Latvia — embark on a thrilling new adventure with the Tet Rally Latvia, a brand-new destination in the WRC calendar
  • Orlen 80th Rally Poland — after a five-year hiatus, the iconic Orlen 80th Rally Poland makes a triumphant return to the calendar
5 new vehicles:
  • Ford Fiesta Rally3 Evo
  • Ford Puma Rally1 HYBRID '24
  • Hyundai i20 N Rally1 HYBRID '24
  • Toyota GR Yaris Rally1 HYBRID '24
  • Toyota GR Yaris Rally2
New customization options:
  • 52 new liveries
  • 104 new drivers and co-drivers

legal_notice: Requires EA SPORTS WRC (sold separately) and all game updates. Limited Spanish language support.

short_description: Experience the thrill of the rally season with new locations, moments, stages, high-performance vehicles, new liveries, and licensed crews. Brace yourself to embark on your continued rally journey.
supported_languages:
English*, French*, Italian*, German*, Spanish - Spain
*languages with full audio support
